name: Illumise
description: The Firefly Pokémon. Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in the night sky. This Pokémon is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to moves that attempt to charm or taunt it.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: Once per short rest, this Pokémon can move to the top of initiative order in a single round, but must use a status-affecting move on its turn.
